content:
researchers at the Center for WorldClass Universities of Shanghai Jiao Tong University published The Academic Ranking of World Universities which reported N.C PERIOD State is No PERIOD  of the top  universities in the world in the field of engineering PERIOD

In the U.S. the ARWU ranks engineering at N.C PERIOD State No PERIOD  in the nation but among public universities alone in the University ranks No PERIOD  PERIOD

The ARWU evaluates more than  institutions PERIOD

Institutions were ranked based on several indicators such as highly cited researchers papers indexed in science citation indexexpanded the percentage of papers published in the subject journals that are regarded as the top  percent of all subject related journals and the expenditures the institution invests in the subject related research according to ARWU PERIOD

According to the College of Engineering the university spent nearly  million in research expenditures during the  school year PERIOD

Thats significant said Louis MartinVega dean of the College of Engineering PERIOD

The college of engineerings goal is not to only be a leading U.S PERIOD public college in the field but also one of the very top in the world Vega said PERIOD

I think its a point of pride said Vega PERIOD The fact that we are at that level with how many colleges of engineering are around the world. the colleges that made the list make up an elite group the number ranked in the field of engineering only included  schools in the whole world PERIOD

In addition to the ARWU the U.S PERIOD News and World Report ranked N.C PERIOD State eighth in upandcoming schools as well as twenty-ninth in graduate engineering programs PERIOD

Vega said he attributes the success of the college to its faculty and students PERIOD

Weve been able to bring in some really outstanding faculty Vega said PERIOD Its a result quite honestly of just tremendous efforts by our faculty and our staff and students PERIOD Our students are extremely competitive externally they win all sorts of award and things

 percent of incoming freshman in the college are in the top  percent of their class according to the College of Engineerings website PERIOD

Members of faculty have received honors such as National Medals of Technology and Innovation Presidential Awards for Excellence in Science Mathematics and Engineering Mentoring and an Emmy Award for plasma display technology PERIOD

Vega said he believes it is critical for the university as a whole that the college of engineering continues to thrive PERIOD Vega said he wants to make it clear that he is not satisfied and he wants his college to go even higher PERIOD

In my mind we want to be even higher said Vega PERIOD We dont want this to be a high water mark. vega said he has high expectations for his college most of all because of the impact it will have on the success of its students in terms of career opportunities PERIOD

Its one of the best engineering schools said Arda Cole a sophomore in computer engineering PERIOD Several different top college lists say that its one of the best

Cole said he desires to have a career working with computers and chose to come to the University because of its reputation and what he heard from various college university rankings PERIOD

According to Vega the college of engineerings reputation and growth has attracted employers from all over to take an interest in N.C PERIOD State students PERIOD

Weve got  plus companies coming here to look at hiring and recruiting engineering and computer science students for fulltime positions coop positions and internship positions said Vega referring to the Engineering Career Fair PERIOD

Companies who attended in the past include Microsoft Corporation Centex Homes and ATT PERIOD

Vega says part of the college of engineerings responsibility is to help it achieve its goal of being a premier technological research university PERIOD

The goal is to continue to move upwards really for the benefit of our students more than anything else Vega said PERIOD
